participant_1.background:
I do not own a home because I would rather spend my money on Mountain Dew and pastries.
my family hates my fiancé.
i live with my parents and my little brother.
I like to pet my cat to relieve stress and forget about the day.
My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas.
I go for a walk every morning to relieve stress and have some time to myself.
my husband is a cop.
i am thirty two years old.
I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit.

content.text: Good! I'm about to go on a walk with my dog, do you have any pets?
I have a cat, he's my best friend. I like to pet him when I'm stressed, it really helps me relax.
That's really sweet! I love spending time with my dog, he's like my own personal therapist.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have a good furry friend to help you through the tough times.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love playing video games, it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
Oh, that's cool! I used to play video games a lot when I was younger, but I don't have as much time for it anymore.
That's too bad! It's a great way to pass the time.
Yeah, I know! I miss it.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to go for walks, it's a great way to clear my head.
That's really good! I need to start getting more exercise.
You should! It's really good for you.
Yeah, I know! I'm going to start going for walks more often.
That's great! I'm sure you'll love it
